Detailed Description

The galois lattice.

When the number of concepts reach a threshold, concepts are randomly killed to keep the population under.

Remarks:
Implemented as an array of dynamic arrays, one for each possible cardinal (the size of alphabet). Dynamic arrays contains indexes of pre-allocated concepts (pool size is 128).
